  • Method Details

    • generateOrders

      java.util.List<OrdersService.OrderDto> generateOrders() throws BusinessException
      Generates orders following the wording
      Returns:
      the list of new order dto generated
      Throws:
      BusinessException - DOES NOT

    • findByProviderNif

      java.util.List<OrdersService.OrderDto> findByProviderNif​(java.lang.String nif) throws BusinessException
      Returns all the orders for the provider identified by its nif
      Parameters:
      nif -
      Returns:
      a list with orders or empty if there is no order from the provider
      Throws:
      BusinessException - DOES NOT

    • findByCode

      java.util.Optional<OrdersService.OrderDto> findByCode​(java.lang.String code) throws BusinessException
      Parameters:
      code -
      Returns:
      the order identified by the code or Optional.empty() if does not exist
      Throws:
      BusinessException - DOES NOT

    • receive

      OrdersService.OrderDto receive​(java.lang.String code) throws BusinessException
      Updates prices and stocks of all involved spare parts and updates the order reception date to today and its status is changed to RECEIVED
      Parameters:
      code -
      Returns:
      the order dto with the updated status
      Throws:
      BusinessException - in the following cases: - the order does not exist - the order is not in status PENDING
